msbt.message: Hey. Yeah Hey. You live on this island?Thought so. I'm from, like, the next island over. My name's Harvey. Glad to meet you, friend. You can call me "Harv" if you want Wonder why no one ever does that Is the "vey" part just fun to say?

Sorry—got a bit sidetracked there I came here for a reason. Gimme a minute, and I'll remember why. Got it! I keep hearing about this island and how much folks dig the scene here. So I thought I'd check it out. I'm gonna start this far-out artists' collective, and I'm looking for ideas.
So what's the deal? I'd heard that this place was deserted, like, literally a deserted island. You the honcho that put this place at the head of the class?
Wait—this ol' noodle just had a casserole of an idea! You should visit my island! Just hit the airport and tell 'em you want to go to Harv's Island. That's the name of my pad. Groovy, right?
Anyway, nice jawin' with you. I'm gonna stroll around and see what makes tick.
You know how lots of folks have a hobby? Mine is snapping photos— real shutterdog here. I even built a photo studio at my pad! Any time you want to take some pictures, come on by!
Any time you want to visit, bud, just head to the airport and get aboard the Harv's Island Express.
I wanna learn from your example and make my island, like, the perfect artists' collective. And maybe make it so I'm not the only one there
You a visitor here too? Right on, right on! Let me know if you find a good sightseeing tour, bud!
Always up for a little chat. It's corny, but I really do think the best part of traveling is the folks you meet.

I'm pickin' up a different scent from you than I get from the others on this islandThe locals here smell mostly like , but I'd say you give off more of a aroma You, uh, might say I've got a nose for this sort of thing!
Hey, I know you! What a wild coincidence, bumping into you here! Makes you wonder
Nothin' like meeting somebody you know when you're traveling to make the world feel small, eh?
, how've you been?<10_4 /> You should come visit me on my island! Like, soon!
Heeeeyyou from around here? I'm visiting, and I just wanted to saygreat island!
Travel's great, but the best part is shootin' the breeze with whoever you trip over on the way!

You wanna know how I knew you're from this island and not a wandering spirit like me? The nose knows, bud. Everyone from here smells just a BIT like straight from the farmer's market. But it's a good smell! Nothin' to be embarrassed about. Not as if you smell of or the like.
Someday, when we meet again I wonder if I'll remember you and you'll remember meWell, either way, give me a holler if you do remember, and I'm sorry if I don't!
